name: amanda devers
text: Delicious just like I remember.  The staff is friendly and kind and the resturant is clean and bright.

name: Jacques Newgen
text: Love the pizza. Only problem for some reason can't order online for delivery because my address won't pull up in their system so have to phone order. Good thing is if you pick up there is a drive through. Thin pizza good flavor from plain cheese to the works. If you eat in it's paper products and plastic containers.

name: S. Mor
text: Pizza is GREAT but your website (Updated site) is garbage.  I just tried ordering pizza online on the new website and it wont let me proceed once I selected my choices.  I tried 2 different browsers and nothing.  I then tried submitting a …More

name: Dawn Williams
text: 500 stars. Best pizza ever. They even know how to cook a pizza with a bunch of toppings so that it doesn't get soggy. Perfectly crispy thin crust.

name: John Quezada
text: This pizza is really good and customer service is great.  Ramon the manager really did his best to take care of me when our family favorite pizza was off the menu. He went out his way to make sure we got the pizza no matter what. Thanks Ramon! Now that's customer service!

name: Jason Blye
text: I'd give this place zero stars if I could. Stopped by there 2 weeks ago for the first time. It was around 1 o'clock and the lobby was empty(already questioning my decision) 2 employees were doing what seemed to be menial tasks so I grabbed …More

name: root488
text: I hope they reopen soon. It's the best pizza and subs in Manassas! Great food!

name: Gina Askew
text: We had a large catering order. Everything was delicious. Can't wait to order again next month.

name: William Bezek
text: Love the good but very disappointed in the service lately.  Taking more than one hour to get pizza for pickup from on line orders.  When visiting restaurant today, waited at counter for over ten minutes without being waited on.  Left very …More

name: Malik Reed
text: Amazing! Pure, rich, quality. I'm from BROOKLYN. Been craving for a place with a similar taste. Bye bye Pizza chains. Once they spread IT'S OVA!

text: Delicious pizza.  Good customer service.  Nice clean interior.

name: D. Vine-Lee
text: That pizza was delivered to my job and it is so good almost reminded me of the pizza back home in NY.. until I actually went to the pizza parlor and seeing how dirty it was inside the people don't use gloves they were dropping things picking it up with their hands it was gross!!!
